step.datasource:
select s.cmp_wwn as CustomerID , ok.ordernr as FreeTextField_01 , case when ok.syscreator = 10152 then 99999 else ok.syscreator end as EmpID , 'Export Licentie Aanvragen ' + rtrim(ltrim(ok.ordernr)) as Description , 6023 as type from orsrg os with (nolock) inner join items i with (nolock) on os.artcode = i.ItemCode inner join orkrg ok with (nolock) on ok.ordernr = os.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.debnr = ok.verzdebnr
cross apply ( select top(1) sc.cmp_wwn from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy sc with (nolock) where 1=1 and rtrim(ltrim(sc.cmp_code)) = ok.verzdebnr ) s
where 1=1 and ISNULL(i.UserNumber_06, 0) > 0 and c.sct_code = 'ML' and ok.ord_soort = 'V' and ok.afgehandld = 0 group by ok.ordernr, s.cmp_wwn, ok.syscreator

select s.cmp_wwn as CustomerID , ok.ordernr as FreeTextField_01 , case when ok.syscreator = 10152 then 99999 else ok.syscreator end as EmpID , 'Export Licentie Aanvragen ' + rtrim(ltrim(ok.ordernr)) as Description , 6023 as type from orsrg os with (nolock) inner join items i with (nolock) on os.artcode = i.ItemCode inner join orkrg ok with (nolock) on ok.ordernr = os.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.debnr = ok.verzdebnr
cross apply ( select top(1) sc.cmp_wwn from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy sc with (nolock) where 1=1 and rtrim(ltrim(sc.cmp_code)) = ok.verzdebnr ) s
where 1=1 and ISNULL(i.UserNumber_06, 0) > 0 and c.sct_code = 'ML' and ok.ord_soort = 'V' and ok.afgehandld = 0 group by ok.ordernr, s.cmp_wwn, ok.syscreator

select s.cmp_wwn as CustomerID , ok.ordernr as FreeTextField_01 , case when ok.syscreator = 10152 then 99999 else ok.syscreator end as EmpID , 'Export Licentie Aanvragen ' + rtrim(ltrim(ok.ordernr)) as Description , 6023 as type from orsrg os with (nolock) inner join items i with (nolock) on os.artcode = i.ItemCode inner join orkrg ok with (nolock) on ok.ordernr = os.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.debnr = ok.verzdebnr
cross apply ( select top(1) sc.cmp_wwn from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy sc with (nolock) where 1=1 and rtrim(ltrim(sc.cmp_code)) = ok.verzdebnr ) s
where 1=1 and ISNULL(i.UserNumber_06, 0) > 0 and c.sct_code = 'ML' and ok.ord_soort = 'V' and ok.afgehandld = 0 group by ok.ordernr, s.cmp_wwn, ok.syscreator
